ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the same problem on occasion, here is what I do.  Fisrt off make sure you firewall (if you have one) is disabled.  Second, power down your dsl, wait 30
ygData.messageBody:
I have the same problem on occasion, here is what I do.  Fisrt off make sure you firewall (if you have one) is disabled.  Second, power down your dsl, wait 30 seconds, power up. After your DSL "re-boots" try to re-connect to EQ.  If this still dosn't work, power down DSL, re-boot your pc, then turn DSL back on.  Good luck.

Bonney <yo_bonney@...> wrote:
I have a dsl provider but it won't connect but I am still online
somehow and I can't get on eq everytime I click on the shortcut it
says patching and goes no farther. Any Ideas?




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
